channel.title: RuneScape 2007 C++ client/source
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone has ever made a C++ version of RuneScape? If so is it free, if so where can I download it?

item.title: RuneScape 2007 C++ client/source
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“NewbProgramming, post:3, topic:554970”]A little more information:

I’m not asking for a complete or even stable release, but if it has at least been attempted can I get the link to that?
I am really good at C++ and can continue to project.
I just wouldn’t know where to start because I’m clueless how a Java client works.[/quote]Im pretty sure there was a started project u can search n dl section

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2007 C++ client/source
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

I love C++ But to be honest i don’t think anybody besides Jagex http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/NXT Feels the need to make a C++ Version maybe once the NXT Client officially comes out maybe Someone will Rip it and we may see some C++ Clients but The server will stay and Hopefully remain in Java

P.s The chances of this happening are next to nothing, NXT is for rs3

Read full topic
